SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package control

Class CompanyRepController

java.lang.Object
control.CompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends Object
Controller class for managing Company Representative operations. Handles the business logic for company representative interactions and requests.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepController

      public CompanyRepController(boundary.CompanyRepView view, InternshipService internshipService, ApplicationController applicationController, FilterController filterController)
      Constructs a new CompanyRepController. Initializes the controller with the specific view, services, and sub-controllers required to manage Company Representative operations.
      Parameters:
      view - The UI view component for the Company Representative.
      internshipService - The service class used to manage internship data.
      applicationController - The controller used to manage student applications.
      filterController - The controller used to handle list filtering logic.

  • Method Details

    • showMain

      public void showMain(CompanyRep rep)
      Displays the main menu and handles the primary navigation for a Company Representative. This method serves as the entry point for the representative's session, allowing them to access various features such as creating, editing, or deleting internships.
      Parameters:
      rep - The currently logged-in Company Representative.

    • manageApplications

      public void manageApplications(CompanyRep rep)
      Manages the incoming applications for internships posted by the Company Representative. This method typically allows the representative to view, accept, or reject student applications associated with their job listings.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative managing the applications.

    • createInternship

      public void createInternship(CompanyRep rep)
      Initiates the process for a Company Representative to create a new internship. This method typically prompts the view for input and uses the service to save the new listing.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative object who is creating the internship.

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(CompanyRep rep)
      Facilitates the editing of an existing internship listing. This method allows the Company Representative to select one of their posted internships and modify its details.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative who owns the internship to be edited.

    • deleteInternship

      public void deleteInternship(CompanyRep rep)
      Handles the process of deleting an internship posted by a specific Company Representative. This method typically displays the representative's current listings and allows them to remove one.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative who wishes to delete an internship.

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(CompanyRep rep)
      Toggles the visibility status of a specific internship listing. This method allows the Company Representative to select an internship and change its status (e.g., from open/visible to closed/hidden), preventing or allowing new applications.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative who owns the internship.

    • listMyInternships

      public void listMyInternships(CompanyRep rep)
      Retrieves and displays all internships created by a specific Company Representative. This method filters the global internship list to show only those belonging to the provided representative.
      Parameters:
      rep - The Company Representative whose internships should be listed.
